author: Justin
title: Comment on Matt will be on ‚ÄúOutside the Lines‚Äù today to talk about the UofL scandal by Justin
text:
Posted in Basketball , Main | 30 Responses 
With football on a bye week, the UofL sex scandal continues to be the main story today, and this afternoon, our own Matt Jones will go on ESPN‚Äôs ‚ÄúOutside the Lines‚Äù to discuss the allegations surrounding the Louisville basketball program, and whether or not Rick Pitino can survive. 
Tune in to ESPN2 at 1:30 p.m. ET to watch Matt do what Matt does best. Here‚Äôs a preview: Article written by Mrs. Tyler Thompson No, I will not make you a sandwich, but you can follow me on Twitter @MrsTylerKSR or email me . 30 responses to ‚ÄúMatt will be on ‚ÄúOutside the Lines‚Äù today to talk about the UofL scandal‚Äù Old white guy October 5, 2015 at 12:17 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Yes!! Let‚Äôs see him roast Jurich for Hookergate. Luther In Louisville October 5, 2015 at 12:29 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Valvano has spent the last 10 mins ranting about Matt being on OTL. I love it‚Ä¶.! the ghost of Bill Hicks October 5, 2015 at 12:33 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Bring up how SMU got hammered but UNC is being ignored. Ha! October 5, 2015 at 12:40 pm | Permalink 
At this point, I couldn‚Äôt care less about the UNC crap. I wanna see that loudmouth, too big for its britches program down the road burned to the ground. 
And revel in their tears as it‚Äôs delusional fan base watch that 2013 banner get taken down. 
All of this is karma for all their shit talking. Jeff October 5, 2015 at 2:29 pm | Permalink 
I agree. I wouldn‚Äôt have taken nearly as much joy IF UL and their fans didn‚Äôt act like their program was spotless, and UK‚Äôs was a cesspool. Its always been ironic that they call UK & Cal ‚Äúsleazy‚Äù when they employ, or have employed Pitino, Petrino, Hurt, etc. Just typing those names make me cringe, yet their fans act like none of that matters. Integrity of the program, indeed! BenHur October 5, 2015 at 12:40 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Finally some justice for those heathens. Fight the good fight Matt. Luther October 5, 2015 at 12:44 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Stay classy, Matt‚Ä¶ papasnapper October 5, 2015 at 12:51 pm | Permalink 
That‚Äôs my concern. Let‚Äôs hope Matt‚Äôs distaste for all things UofL doesn‚Äôt distort his thoughts/words. I hope his giddiness doesn‚Äôt shine through. Ha! October 5, 2015 at 12:56 pm | Permalink 
Aw, Leuther, U mad bro??? Booby Petrino October 5, 2015 at 1:44 pm | Permalink 
lol stay classy while talking about hookers? This whole situation isn‚Äôt classy. Louisville isn‚Äôt classy. UL spitroast October 5, 2015 at 12:49 pm | Permalink | Reply 
About time that morally bankrupt athletic department gets the hammer. How many scandals can those clowns survive? Possible Facepalm October 5, 2015 at 12:56 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Matt, 
Please keep in mind you are not only representing yourself, but you are speaking at that moment for the face of Cat Nation. Please DO NOT be a douche and embarrass us! 
Thank You, Kussy October 5, 2015 at 1:02 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Matt does not represent me. Matt is no more qualified than anyone else to speak. I don‚Äôt care what he says. Brian October 5, 2015 at 1:04 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Seems to be a lot of Louisville apologists commenting on this post. Strange‚Ä¶.. Dano October 5, 2015 at 1:23 pm | Permalink | Reply 
For today‚Äôs fun reading‚Ä¶ http://www.scout.com/college/louisville/forums/2755-the-yum/14157908-today-outside-the-lines-will-be-discussing-it wildcat502 October 5, 2015 at 1:30 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I`m a UK fan, but having Matt on to talk about this makes UK look bad. I wish anyone with UK ties would just stay out if it. Ha! October 5, 2015 at 1:35 pm | Permalink 
U mad? üòâ Don't get involved October 5, 2015 at 1:38 pm | Permalink 
I agree completely. Let‚Äôs let a Louisville person discuss this issue. There‚Äôs no reason to bring the name UK or anyone associated with UK into this conversation. Brian October 5, 2015 at 1:40 pm | Permalink 
All a UofL person would have talked about was how this is all somehow UK‚Äôs fault. Brian October 5, 2015 at 1:41 pm | Permalink 
Hey look, more UofL apologists!! LOL agreed October 5, 2015 at 2:14 pm | Permalink 
Agree also. Whose idea was it to invite Jones on OTL? I don‚Äôt get it. Seems like ESPN would be above that even if Matt isn‚Äôt Booby Petrino October 5, 2015 at 2:24 pm | Permalink 
being above that? Above talking about a rival school paying for hookers for athletes? you people need a sense of humor, you sound boring as shit. Jim. October 5, 2015 at 1:35 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Matt Jones is the most childish sports person that has been on radio or TV.And for him to have the following he has in the ‚Äúbig bleu‚Äùnation is very telling about the IQ of the UK fanatics.I listened today just to know for sure what a low life he is. 
He ranted on about Pitino having to go because even if Pitino didn‚Äôt know about it,he is the man at the top and has to take responsibility for it as coach.This from the same person that has said again and again that Cal carried none of the blame for the seasons being pulled at Memphis and UMass.Matt is the same ‚ÄúUK Hero‚Äù that convicted Chris Jones when the first report came out. 
To answer your question as to why would a whore lie.Matt. it‚Äôs about money. 
I know something wrong happened but I would like find the facts before believing a whore that pimps her own underage daughters. Ha! October 5, 2015 at 1:37 pm | Permalink 
Your program is going down, Jim. Hahahahahahah ! 
1980 and 1986. Again. ukcory15 October 5, 2015 at 1:42 pm | Permalink | Reply 
Yeah, I am a huge UK fan and supporter. I follow this site everyday but I don‚Äôt think Matt Jones should be on Outside The Lines! He is going to make us all look bad. Ha! October 5, 2015 at 1:45 pm | Permalink 
‚Äô15, huh? You just start at UK? agreed October 5, 2015 at 2:15 pm | Permalink 
Ha! you don‚Äôt understand classy bro? Booby Petrino October 5, 2015 at 1:47 pm | Permalink | Reply 
lol Matt make us look bad. Shew, the trolls are out in full force today! Keep up the good work Matt. Trolls are lining those pockets! Dude October 5, 2015 at 1:49 pm | Permalink 
No doubt. Louisville made THEMSELVES look bad. Matt is just going to be on there to discuss it. üòâ Justin October 5, 2015 at 2:29 pm | Permalink | Reply 
I honestly dont see the point of having Matt on OTL. It doesnt really make sense to have a UK fan discussing UofL. I think it would be smarter to have a UL fan on to say what they think about the scandal and how it should be handled. But with that being said, good luck Matt.
